result.reason: A variable insertion helper for external tool arguments is a UX enhancement; the window has a basic 'Variables' button but could be improved with a dropdown/autocomplete listing all supported tokens.
result.approach: Enhance the existing Variables button in ExternalToolsWindow to show a dropdown menu listing all supported %TOKEN% placeholders with descriptions, allowing one-click insertion into the arguments text field.

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the codebase analysis, issue #1291 is about a helper/UI to assist users in inserting variable tokens when configuring external tools. The `ExternalToolsWindow` already has a "Variables" button, so this may be requesting enhancements to that helper (better dropdown, documentation, autocomplete, etc.).

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"A variable insertion helper for external tool arguments is a UX enhancement; the window has a basic 'Variables' button but could be improved with a dropdown/autocomplete listing all supported tokens.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ExternalToolsWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ExternalToolsWindow.Designer.cs","mRemoteNG/Tools/ExternalToolArgumentParser.cs"],"approach":"Enhance the existing Variables button in ExternalToolsWindow to show a dropdown menu listing all supported %TOKEN% placeholders with descriptions, allowing one-click insertion into the arguments text field."}
```
